description: Specifies the starting station for the module. Every module must have this, and which station is used is determined by the module to which the starting ship belongs.

hull.description: Id of the hull of the station

guard.$comment: ^^dirty hack to allow comment as per https://stackoverflow.com/questions/33565090/json-schema-property-description-and-ref-usage

items.description: Space separated list of items ship possesses. See /docs/items.txt for more detailed explanation.

density.description: Unused. On guard, denotes how many of the ship is to spawn
